about_the_game:
Zombie Black Layout Prowl Skin ( ͡ʘ ͜ʖ ͡ʘ)
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) Enjoy this customly designed Zombie Onscreen Keyboard, it displays your previous 5 second WPM Burst Speed, Key Rollovers, TWpm, Secs typed. Works exactly like the Color-coded skin.
This Keyboard is for Advanced Typists only, since it has no markings on the keycaps.
The appropriate keycap and appropriate finger will still light up while you touch to guide you in proper form for the home row touch typing method.
Be sure to check out the color-coded Keyboard available on Steam if you need help in learning the proper finger placement for each key.

You can find it and many other skins from the Parent Game to this DLC.
--
As always... "Visit the website" on the right side of this page, about half-way down offers users a chance to race me on the weekends from my Discord Group!
I Hope to see you there, test your speed against someone who's within the top 1% in the world on free typing sites.

content_descriptors.notes: A Bit of blood around the Zombie's mouth, his eyes glow to stare right through you.

detailed_description:
Zombie Black Layout Prowl Skin ( ͡ʘ ͜ʖ ͡ʘ)
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) Enjoy this customly designed Zombie Onscreen Keyboard, it displays your previous 5 second WPM Burst Speed, Key Rollovers, TWpm, Secs typed. Works exactly like the Color-coded skin.
This Keyboard is for Advanced Typists only, since it has no markings on the keycaps.
The appropriate keycap and appropriate finger will still light up while you touch to guide you in proper form for the home row touch typing method.
Be sure to check out the color-coded Keyboard available on Steam if you need help in learning the proper finger placement for each key.

You can find it and many other skins from the Parent Game to this DLC.

legal_notice: You may use this product in any videos to show off your typing abilities once you buy it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, VISTA, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.5 gHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: standard
  • Storage: 23 MB available space
  • Sound Card: standard

  • OS: XP, VISTA, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.5 gHz
